author: Mario Andretti
quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
keywords: Success, Motivation, Determination, Goal, Commitment, Desire, Excellence, Key, Pursuit, Will

author: Alexis Arguello
quote: I'd say the most memorable thing for me was my dedication and motivation in how I got so involved in boxing.

author: Desi Arnaz
quote: A single prop that does not look real to an audience can louse you up. The same is true of the smallest flaw in setting up the motivation in a story line.

author: Norman Ralph Augustine
quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

author: John Badham
quote: The personality problem is so tough when you're not able to pay people. It's bad enough when you can pay people, but, when you have people working for free, often their motivation is diminished considerably.

author: Russell Banks
quote: One of the things I have tried to do with this book and with all of them really is avoid that simple, easy, reductionist view of motivation and to show we do things for a complex net of reasons, a real braid of reasons.

author: Warren Beatty
quote: Being here allows me to make the case that not all aging, narcissistic movie actors whose children could be mistaken for their grandchildren necessarily act with the same motivation.

author: Ahmed Ben Bella
quote: Yes, my life is a life of combat; I can say that this has never stopped for a single instant. It is a combat that started for me at the age of 16. I'm 90 years old now, and my motivation hasn't changed; it's the same fervour that drives me.
keywords: Age, Life, Motivation, Now, Old, Years

author: Bo Bennett
quote: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.

author: Hans Blix
quote: Iraq did not spontaneously opt for disarmament. They did it as part of a ceasefire, so they were forced to do it, otherwise the war might have gone on. So the motivation has been very different.

author: Edward de Bono
quote: One very important aspect of motivation is the willingness to stop and to look at things that no one else has bothered to look at. This simple process of focusing on things that are normally taken for granted is a powerful source of creativity.

author: Dennis Brown
quote: But now I'm getting that spiritual motivation to visit Africa.

author: Les Brown
quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.

author: Herman Cain
quote: My motivation for running for Senate was not for the stature of being a senator, but because I wanted to make a difference on issues I feel passionate about.

author: Orson Scott Card
quote: I wonder sometimes if the motivation for writers ought to be contempt, not admiration.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: People need motivation to do anything. I don't think human beings learn anything without desperation.

author: Raymond Chandler
quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

author: Julian Clary
quote: It was all about wanting to get revenge. Pathetic, really, but it still is the motivation.

author: Roger Clemens
quote: Everybody kind of perceives me as being angry. It's not anger, it's motivation.

author: William J. Clinton
quote: In the new economy, information, education, and motivation are everything.

author: Noel Coward
quote: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.

author: Dorothy Denning
quote: While many hackers have the knowledge, skills, and tools to attack computer systems, they generally lack the motivation to cause violence or severe economic or social harm.
keywords: Motivation, Knowledge, Cause, Computer, Harm, Tools, Violence

author: Dorothy Denning
quote: If we take as given that critical infrastructures are vulnerable to a cyber terrorist attack, then the question becomes whether there are actors with the capability and motivation to carry out such an operation.

author: Anita Desai
quote: Usually a feeling of disappointment follows the book, because what I hoped to write is not what I actually accomplished. However, it becomes a motivation to write the next book.

author: Mike Ditka
quote: People want a cop-out, listen I'm a realist and I talk about motivation, talk about all the things it takes to be greater or are important to win and people want to use excuses all the time.
keywords: Time, Motivation, People, Excuses, Talk, Want

author: Donna Dixon
quote: I love Nautilus and stretching. The results are immediate, and that gives me the motivation to continue.

author: Placido Domingo
quote: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently.

author: Ann Druyan
quote: Well, I actually grew up in the sixties. I feel very lucky, actually, that that was my slice of time that I was dealt. Let's remember that the real motivation in the sixties, and even in the fifties, was the Cold War.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Deficiency motivation doesn't work. It will lead to a life-long pursuit of try to fix me. Learn to appreciate what you have and where and who you are.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

author: Lorrie Fair
quote: I don't know if there are words to describe my motivation.

author: Suzanne Farrell
quote: But what was my motivation was music, and the fact that I love to move around. I'm always moving around.

author: Teri Garr
quote: I have worked enough and I am happy to be touring the country speaking about living with MS to give people inspiration and motivation to help themselves.
keywords: Motivation, People, Inspiration, Country, Help, Living

author: Greg Ginn
quote: If people are really excited about their music, and that's their primary motivation, then that comes through in demo tapes. That's the most important ingredient.

author: Daniel Goleman
quote: Motivation aside, if people get better at these life skills, everyone benefits: The brain doesn't distinguish between being a more empathic manager and a more empathic father.
keywords: Life, Manager, Father, Motivation, People, Being

author: Jonny Greenwood
quote: It's what the Pixies always said about music - they were writing songs and just trying not to be boring. That was their main motivation and it worked for them. I remember reading that and thinking that was the way to do it.
keywords: Music, Motivation, Reading, Songs, Thinking, Trying, Writing

author: Marvin Hagler
quote: You know looking back on it now I used the fight and after the fight as motivation, to make sure I was going to be the best middleweight in the world for a long time.

author: Jimmy Haynes
quote: The last two years we got beat in this round. They came out with the motivation to win.

author: Jerome Hines
quote: The motivation part is all essential in keeping my voice, but there are the human factors of discipline.

author: Alfred Hitchcock
quote: When an actor comes to me and wants to discuss his character, I say, 'It's in the script.' If he says, 'But what's my motivation?, ' I say, 'Your salary.'

author: Dee Hock
quote: If you look to lead, invest at least 40% of your time managing yourself - your ethics, character, principles, purpose, motivation, and conduct. Invest at least 30% managing those with authority over you, and 15% managing your peers.
keywords: Time, Motivation, Character, Purpose, Authority, Ethics, Principles

author: Lou Holtz
quote: Motivation is simple. You eliminate those who are not motivated.

author: Lee Iacocca
quote: Motivation is everything. You can do the work of two people, but you can't be two people. Instead, you have to inspire the next guy down the line and get him to inspire his people.

author: Chuck Klosterman
quote: The biggest problem in rock journalism is that often the writer's main motivation is to become friends with the band. They're not really journalists; they're people who want to be involved in rock and roll.
keywords: Motivation, People, Friends, Journalism, Want, Writer

author: Walter Savage Landor
quote: We talk on principal, but act on motivation.

author: Tom Landry
quote: I don't believe in team motivation. I believe in getting a team prepared so it knows it will have the necessary confidence when it steps on a field and be prepared to play a good game.

author: Spike Lee
quote: All directors are storytellers, so the motivation was to tell the story I wanted to tell. That's what I love.

author: Hermann Maier
quote: I sat down with my trainers to check my past seasons and to see what could be done to keep me motivated and in good shape. I had to find a new motivation, a new momentum.

author: Aimee Mann
quote: I certainly understand that we're all trying to make a living, but I'm not thinking about that when I'm making it. And if that's your sole motivation, it's going to reflect that narcissistic greed, and you're going to hear it in the music.
keywords: Music, Motivation, Greed, Living, Thinking, Trying

author: Robert Mapplethorpe
quote: I don't think any collector knows his true motivation.

author: Abraham Maslow
quote: Classic economic theory, based as it is on an inadequate theory of human motivation, could be revolutionized by accepting the reality of higher human needs, including the impulse to self actualization and the love for the highest values.
keywords: Love, Motivation, Values, Needs, Reality, Self, Theory

author: Dave Matthews
quote: I fear that our true motivation is about oil and our own flailing economy; about the failure to destroy Al Qaeda and about revenge.
keywords: Motivation, Fear, Failure, Economy, Oil, Revenge

author: Mary McDonnell
quote: That moment was very important because it was political. That's what has to be done, so they struck a deal. She figures his is a well-thought-out motivation that she felt was worthy trade-off. The motivation here is survival, and she has to think like a leader.

author: Michael Moore
quote: The motivation for war is simple. The U.S. government started the war with Iraq in order to make it easy for U.S. corporations to do business in other countries. They intend to use cheap labor in those countries, which will make Americans rich.
keywords: Business, Government, War, Motivation, Americans, Corporations, Countries, Iraq, Labor, Order, Will

author: John Negroponte
quote: We negotiated with the Honduran government the establishment of a regional military training center, for training central American forces, but the primary motivation for doing that was to be able to bolster the quality, improve the quality of the El Salvadoran fighting forces.
keywords: Government, Quality, Motivation, American, Fighting, Military, Training

author: Bob Nelson
quote: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.

author: Donald Norman
quote: We expert teachers know that motivation and emotional impact are what matter.

author: Ellen Ochoa
quote: What everyone in the astronaut corps shares in common is not gender or ethnic background, but motivation, perseverance, and desire - the desire to participate in a voyage of discovery.

author: Anne Parillaud
quote: I had never even thought I'd be an actress - I was supposed to be a lawyer. But the motivation is the same: when you act, you defend a role; you have to be convincing. It's the same career.

author: Philippe Perrin
quote: And, I think, as a kid, I had a strong motivation to do something of my life. And, I think that's the strongest motivation I really got. And, that came obviously from my parents and my grandparents.

author: Vince Poscente
quote: Walking your talk is a great way to motivate yourself. No one likes to live a lie. Be honest with yourself, and you will find the motivation to do what you advise others to do.

author: Pat Riley
quote: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.

author: Pat Riley
quote: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning.

author: Nora Roberts
quote: Action, reaction, motivation, emotion, all have to come from the characters. Writing a love scene requires the same elements from the writer as any other.
keywords: Love, Motivation, Action, Emotion, Writer, Writing

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If someone is going down the wrong road, he doesn't need motivation to speed him up. What he needs is education to turn him around.

author: Bruno Rossi
quote: The initial motivation of the experiment which led to this discovery was a subconscious feeling for the inexhaustible wealth of nature, a wealth that goes far beyond the imagination of man.
keywords: Imagination, Nature, Motivation, Wealth, Discovery, Feeling, Man

author: Mark Rylance
quote: But I find with Francis Bacon, some of the things were in the place, and someone who was connected with these schools of thought, and someone who had a motivation that equals the scope of the comedy and the tragedy in the plays.

author: Jim Ryun
quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

author: Andrzej Wajda
quote: In the same period, Polish literature also underwent some significant changes. From social-political literature, which had a great tradition and strong motivation to be that way, Polish literature changed its focus to a psychological rather than a social one.

author: Marilyn vos Savant
quote: I think change is possible, but only for individuals who were never truly gay in the first place and who have a strong personal motivation to recover their heterosexuality.

author: Monica Seles
quote: It doesn't matter who is playing or how old they are. I just worry about what I can control. It doesn't give me more or less motivation.

author: Sidney Sheldon
quote: I try to give both my heroes and villains an emotional dimensionality which provides the motivation for their actions.

author: Michael Shermer
quote: Myths are stories that express meaning, morality or motivation. Whether they are true or not is irrelevant.

author: Jane Smiley
quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.

author: Eliot Spitzer
quote: I don't care about motivation. I care about credibility.

author: Peter Steele
quote: I like to put on hardcore when I have to clean my apartment, which I hate to do, but it's motivational. I like old heavy metal when I'm outside working on my car. Music has definite functions for me.

author: Leigh Steinberg
quote: I just knew that economics had never been my big motivation.

author: J. Michael Straczynski
quote: I also like to look at the dynamic that takes place between religion and science because, in a way, both are asking the same questions: Who are we? Where do we come from? Why are we here? Where are we going? The methodologies are diametrically opposed, but their motivation is the same; the wellspring is the same in both cases.

author: Michael Strahan
quote: At the same time, it makes me feel like I have to prove myself to the new guys coming in as well as prove myself to the coaching staff, which is a good bit of motivation for me.

author: James Taylor
quote: That's the motivation of an artist - to seek attention of some kind.

author: Tina Thompson
quote: We had an opportunity to clinch a playoff berth and I think if that's not enough motivation I don't think you should be playing this game.

author: Donald Trump
quote: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.

author: Paul Twitchell
quote: Y'know, the real reason why I was such a failure in the sense of being unable to make any sort of a living was because I was really not motivated. I had no motivation.
keywords: Motivation, Failure, Being, Living, Reason, Sense

author: Margaret J. Wheatley
quote: Even though worker capacity and motivation are destroyed when leaders choose power over productivity, it appears that bosses would rather be in control than have the organization work well.
keywords: Power, Work, Motivation, Control, Bosses, Leaders, Productivity

author: Katarina Witt
quote: Money was never the motivation. It never should be in sports.

author: Markus Wolf
quote: I tried to instill a different motivation, to give them the security and the conviction that they were doing something good, something necessary, something useful - if you want to use a grandiose expression, that they were doing something for peace.
keywords: Peace, Motivation, Conviction, Expression, Security, Want

author: Martin Yan
quote: I think a lot of times it's not money that's the primary motivation factor; it's the passion for your job and the professional and personal satisfaction that you get out of doing what you do that motivates you.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
